Hey! I'm a full stack developer and the founder of fitster and prave. I'm passionate about design, entrepreneurship, epidemiology, and machine learning.

Currently I'm obtaining my BSc. in Data Science (faculty of Statistical and Actuarial Sciences & faculty of Computer Science) at the University of Western Ontario.

One of my favourite reads: Hackers and Painters by Paul Graham.

jain.aiyush@fitster.ca

MightyMaximus

Projects

Prave

prave.ca

Prave is the affordable alternative to grocery delivery. Our secret: we automatically price match and source your groceries from the cheapest nearby grocery store. We do this because unlike our competitors who inflate the cost of groceries with premiums, we instead profit from the savings we get you. We only earn when you save!

  • Angular2
  • Express
  • MongoDB
  • NodeJS
  • Redux
  • Material
  • SASS

We do this because unlike our competitors who inflate the cost of groceries with premiums, we instead profit from the savings we get you. We only earn when you save!

Fitster

fitster.ca

Imagine avoiding the after-work rush by reserving gym equipment ahead of time, or being able to squeeze in an entire workout during lunch? With Fitster, gym members can reserve gym equipment and gym owners can manage their gyms. By also collecting data on equipment usage, we streamline equipment lease cycling.

  • Angular2
  • Firebase
  • Redux
  • Material
  • SASS

Temporary Filler

Youtube Video here

Imagine avoiding the after-work rush by reserving gym equipment ahead of time, or being able to squeeze in an entire workout during lunch?
